pages.text: Found within the antechamber of the $(thing)Aether's Bronze Dungeons$(), $(thing)Sentries$() are the smaller cousins of the $(thing)Slider$(). However they behave more like $(thing)Slimes$() made of stone, hopping around, with a key difference in their tendency to explode upon colliding with people.
